text: I understand that my participation is voluntary and that I am free to withdraw at any time, without giving any reason and without my legal rights being affected.
I understand that if during the study I tell the research team something that causes them to have concerns in relation to my health and/or welfare they may need to breach my confidentiality.
I agree to my anonymised data being used by research teams for future research.
I agree to take part in this study.
